493         jamonWriter.write("\n    <td>");
494         // 192, 9
495         org.jamon.escaping.Escaping.HTML.write(org.jamon.emit.StandardEmitter.valueOf(htDesc.toStringCustomizedValues()), jamonWriter);
496         // 192, 48
497         jamonWriter.write("</td>\n</tr>\n");
498       }
499       // 194, 8
500       jamonWriter.write("\n\n<p> ");
501       // 196, 5
502       org.jamon.escaping.Escaping.HTML.write(org.jamon.emit.StandardEmitter.valueOf(tables.length), jamonWriter);
503       // 196, 24
504       jamonWriter.write(" table(s) in set. [<a href=tablesDetailed.jsp>Details</a>]</p>\n</table>\n");
505     }
506     // 198, 7
507     jamonWriter.write("\n");
508   }

511   // 227, 1
512   private void __jamon_innerUnit__regionServers(@SuppressWarnings({"unused","hiding"}) final java.io.Writer jamonWriter)
513     throws java.io.IOException
514   {
515     // 228, 1
516     jamonWriter.write("<h2>Region Servers</h2>\n");
517     // 229, 1
518     if ((servers != null && servers.size() > 0))
519     {
520       // 229, 47
521       jamonWriter.write("\n");
522       // 230, 1
523       
524      int totalRegions = 0;
525      int totalRequests = 0; 
526 
527       // 235, 1
528       jamonWriter.write("<table>\n<tr><th rowspan=\"");
529       // 236, 18
530       org.jamon.escaping.Escaping.HTML.write(org.jamon.emit.StandardEmitter.valueOf(servers.size() + 1), jamonWriter);
531       // 236, 41
532       jamonWriter.write("\"></th><th>ServerName</th><th>Start time</th><th>Load</th></tr>\n");
533       // 237, 1
534       
535    ServerName [] serverNames = servers.toArray(new ServerName[servers.size()]);
536      Arrays.sort(serverNames);
537      for (ServerName serverName: serverNames) {
538        // TODO: this is incorrect since this conf might differ from RS to RS
539        // or be set to 0 to get ephemeral ports
540        int infoPort = master.getConfiguration().getInt("hbase.regionserver.info.port", 60030);
541        String url = "http://" + serverName.getHostname() + ":" + infoPort + "/";
542        HServerLoad hsl = master.getServerManager().getLoad(serverName);
543        String loadStr = hsl == null? "-": hsl.toString();
544        if (hsl != null) {
545          totalRegions += hsl.getNumberOfRegions();
546          totalRequests += hsl.getNumberOfRequests();
547        }
548        long startcode = serverName.getStartcode();
549 
550       // 253, 1
551       jamonWriter.write("<tr><td><a href=\"");
552       // 253, 18
553       org.jamon.escaping.Escaping.HTML.write(org.jamon.emit.StandardEmitter.valueOf(url), jamonWriter);
554       // 253, 27
555       jamonWriter.write("\">");
556       // 253, 29
557       org.jamon.escaping.Escaping.HTML.write(org.jamon.emit.StandardEmitter.valueOf(serverName), jamonWriter);
558       // 253, 45
559       jamonWriter.write("</a></td><td>");
560       // 253, 58
561       org.jamon.escaping.Escaping.HTML.write(org.jamon.emit.StandardEmitter.valueOf(new Date(startcode)), jamonWriter);
562       // 253, 83
563       jamonWriter.write("</td><td>");
564       // 253, 92
565       org.jamon.escaping.Escaping.HTML.write(org.jamon.emit.StandardEmitter.valueOf(loadStr), jamonWriter);
566       // 253, 105
567       jamonWriter.write("</td></tr>\n");
568       // 254, 1
569       
570     }
571 
572       // 257, 1
573       jamonWriter.write("<tr><th>Total: </th><td>servers: ");
574       // 257, 34
575       org.jamon.escaping.Escaping.HTML.write(org.jamon.emit.StandardEmitter.valueOf(servers.size()), jamonWriter);
576       // 257, 54
577       jamonWriter.write("</td><td></td><td>requestsPerSecond=");
578       // 257, 90
579       org.jamon.escaping.Escaping.HTML.write(org.jamon.emit.StandardEmitter.valueOf(totalRequests), jamonWriter);
580       // 257, 109
581       jamonWriter.write(", numberOfOnlineRegions=");
582       // 257, 133
583       org.jamon.escaping.Escaping.HTML.write(org.jamon.emit.StandardEmitter.valueOf(totalRegions), jamonWriter);
584       // 257, 151
585       jamonWriter.write("</td></tr>\n</table>\n\n<p>Load is requests per second and count of regions loaded</p>\n");
586     }
587     // 261, 7
588     jamonWriter.write("\n");
589   }
